clipboardHistory.value: pip install numpy pillow  # 提前安装可能需要的依赖

# 下载 PKGBUILD
git clone https://aur.archlinux.org/python-imageio.git
cd python-imageio

# 查看依赖提示（重点检查 PKGBUILD 中的依赖列表）
grep 'depends\|makedepends' PKGBUILD

# 构建安装（显示详细日志）
makepkg -si --noconfirm --log

sudo pacman -S --needed base-devel python-build python-wheel python-setuptools python-poetry-core
pip install --force-reinstall build wheel
sudo pacman -S ffmpeg libjpeg-turbo zlib freetype2 openjpeg2

env = GLFW_IM_MODULE,ibus

#############################
### ENVIRONMENT VARIABLES ###
#############################

env = QT_QPA_PLATFORMTHEME,qt5ct
env = GDK_BACKEND,wayland,x11,*
env = HYPRCURSOR_THEME,catppuccin-mocha-pink-cursors
env = HYPRCURSOR_SIZE,30
env = NVD_BACKEND,direct
env = ELECTRON_OZONE_PLATFORM_HINT,auto

env = MOZ_DRM_DEVICE,/dev/dri/renderD128

env = XDG_SESSION_TYPE,wayland
env = GBM_BACKEND,nvidia-drm

env = __GL_VRR_ALLOWED,1
env = WLR_DRM_NO_ATOMIC,1
env = __GL_GSYNC_ALLOWED,0
env = __GL_VRR_ALLOWED,0
env = HYPRSHOT_DIR,/home/jn/Pictures/ScreenShot # 截图保存目录
env = XCURSOR_SIZE,24
env = HYPRCURSOR_SIZE,24

local function get_plugin_stats()
      local stats = require("lazy").stats()
      return "⚡ Loaded " .. stats.loaded .. " plugins"
    end

local function getGreeting(name)
  local tableTime = os.date '*t'
  local datetime = os.date ' %Y-%m-%d-%A   %H:%M:%S '
  local hour = tableTime.hour
  local greetingsTable = {
    [1] = '  Sleep well',
    [2] = '  Good morning',
    [3] = '  Good afternoon',
    [4] = '  Good evening',
    [5] = '󰖔  Good night',
  }
  local greetingIndex = 0
  if hour == 23 or hour < 7 then
    greetingIndex = 1
  elseif hour < 12 then
    greetingIndex = 2
  elseif hour >= 12 and hour < 18 then
    greetingIndex = 3
  elseif hour >= 18 and hour < 21 then
    greetingIndex = 4
  elseif hour >= 21 then
    greetingIndex = 5
  end
  return datetime .. '  ' .. greetingsTable[greetingIndex] .. ', ' .. name
end
